messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
A Trainer riding a Pokémon!
I like that! Let’s battle it out!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Awesome!
You’re a real wild child!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
You ride atop the waves while riding on
a Pokémon!And you rode right over me!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Yo, Pokémon-riding Trainer!
How about a rematch?
